page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content: Most of the houses in the area are private, although there are some council houses.The houses in the town centre, in the village of Elworth and out in the country are the eldest houses.Outside the town centre and on the outskirts of the village the houses are generally newer.These houses have been built since the beginning of the 20th century.Most of the houses are semi-detached,but still there are a lot of detached,terraced and bungalows,but there are very few flats.The size and design of these houses varies greatly. There is one small{new housing estate} being built at the rear of Elworth C. of E. Cont.School.It contains detached ,semi-detached and terraced houses and some flats.
